Label: ATR+CCS (OC)
Description: Hydrogen from auto-thermal reforming coupled with CCS with oxygen combustion

Label: ATR+CCS (R+OC)
Description: Hydrogen from auto-thermal reforming coupled with CCS with oxygen combustion and fuel recycling

Label: ATR+CCS (R)
Description: Hydrogen from Auto-thermal reforming coupled with CCS with air combustion and fuel recycling

Label: ATR+CCS
Description: Hydrogen from auto-thermal reforming coupled with CCS with air combustion

Label: SMR+CCS
Description: Hydrogen from steam methane reforming coupled with CCS

Label: LTE (grid)
Description: Hydrogen from low-temperature electrolysis using grid power

Label: LTE (wind)
Description: Hydrogen from low-temperature electrolysis using wind power

Label: HTE (grid)
Description: Hydrogen from high-temperature electrolysis using grid power
